name: Caesium sulfate
desc: Caesium sulfate (cesium sulfate) is the inorganic compound and salt with the formula Cs2SO4. It is a white water-soluble solid that is used to prepare dense aqueous solutions for use in isopycnic (or "density-gradient") centrifugation. It is isostructural with potassium salt.

images.alt: Structure of K2SO4, K2CrO4 and some related compounds.tif

Other cations:
Lithium sulfate
Sodium sulfate
Potassium sulfate
Rubidium sulfate
